Package org.ferris.tweial.console.twitter

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TweetRetrievalPriority  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    TweetFilter
    The purpose of this class is to filter List objects of tweets from Twitter.
    TweetRetrievalEvent
    This event supports the data needed during the tweet retrieval process to determine which tweets, if any, will emailed to the user.
    TwitterAccount
    This class represent the authentication information needed to access a user's Twitter account.
    TwitterBuilder  
    TwitterCacheFile
    This is a hard coded File object to "DataDirectory/tweets-cache.ser".
    TwitterDataSource
    The purpose of this class is to provide a small abstraction to how Twitter is getting its data.
    TwitterHandler
    This class handles dealing with Twitter data
    TwitterPage
    This is the consoles view for Twitter related information.
    TwitterPropertiesFile
    This is a hard coded AbstractPropertiesFile object to "ConfigurationDirectory/twitter.properties"
    TwitterStartupObserver
    This class is an event observer for Twitter related actions.
